Comment: Isaacman is literally the first (and to my knowledge only) person to place a Las Vegas sports book wager from orbit.   While commanding a private SpaceX orbital tourism mission.  While "it's OK, I was young" and "what's a couple million in bad checks when you're a billionaire" are considerations, gambling is always a red flag for any public official.  This Administration is like every insider threat lecture we ever got, come to life and wearing a red tie.
Author: Aghast_Cornichon
